text: Othello () is a 1955 Soviet drama movie directed by Sergei Yutkevich.Жванецкий, Гафт, Виктюк: потери 2020 года как прощание с эпохойОтелло It stars Sergei Bondarchuk, Andrei Popov, and Irina Skobtseva. The movie is based on the play Othello by William Shakespeare. ==Actors== * Sergei Bondarchuk as Othello *Andrei Popov as Iago * Irina Skobtseva as Desdemona * Vladimir Soshalsky as Cassio * Yevgeny Vesnik as Roderigo * Antonina Maksimova as Emilia == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1955 drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies set in the 16th century Category:Movies set in Cyprus Category:Movies set in Venice Category:Movies directed by Sergei Yutkevich Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Othello (1955 movie)
